parameter.name: since
parameter.description: The start of the date range to search.

parameter.name: until
parameter.description: The end of the date range to search.

parameter.name: dateRange
parameter.description: The parameter to get all request from begining by setting value to all.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The properties to be returned for each incident.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status of incidents to list. Valid types are triggered, acknowledged and resolved.

parameter.name: incidentKey
parameter.description: The incident key value to search incidents.

parameter.name: service
parameter.description: The service identifier to list incidents for that service.

parameter.name: assignedToUser
parameter.description: The user identifier to list incidents assigned to that user.

parameter.name: timeZone
parameter.description: The time zone to retrive correnspoding incidents.

parameter.name: sortBy
parameter.description: The sorting field with the ascending or descending order.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The number of records to be returned.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: The offset of the first record returned.
